00005 #Now prepare the iso deposits
00006 elPFIsoDepositChargedGsf=isoDepositReplace('gsfElectrons','pfAllChargedHadrons')
00007 elPFIsoDepositChargedAllGsf=isoDepositReplace('gsfElectrons','pfAllChargedParticles')

00010 #elPFIsoDepositGamma=isoDepositReplace('pfSelectedElectrons','pfAllPhotons')
00011 elPFIsoDepositGammaGsf= cms.EDProducer("CandIsoDepositProducer",
00012                                        src = cms.InputTag("gsfElectrons"),
00013                                        MultipleDepositsFlag = cms.bool(False),
00014                                        trackType = cms.string('candidate'),
00015                                        ExtractorPSet = cms.PSet(
00016     Diff_z = cms.double(99999.99),
00017     ComponentName = cms.string('PFCandWithSuperClusterExtractor'),
00018     DR_Max = cms.double(1.0),
00019     Diff_r = cms.double(99999.99),
00020     inputCandView = cms.InputTag("pfAllPhotons"),
00021     DR_Veto = cms.double(0),
00022     SCMatch_Veto = cms.bool(False),
00023     MissHitSCMatch_Veto = cms.bool(True),
00024     DepositLabel = cms.untracked.string('')
00025     )
00026                                        )

00039 elPFIsoValueCharged03PFIdGsf = cms.EDProducer("PFCandIsolatorFromDeposits",
00040                                            deposits = cms.VPSet(
00041     cms.PSet(
00042     src = cms.InputTag("elPFIsoDepositChargedGsf"),
00043     deltaR = cms.double(0.3),
00044     weight = cms.string('1'),
00045     vetos = cms.vstring('EcalEndcaps:ConeVeto(0.015)'),
00046     skipDefaultVeto = cms.bool(True),
00047     mode = cms.string('sum'),
00048     PivotCoordinatesForEBEE = cms.bool(True)
00049     )
00050     )
00051                                            )
